sentences.english: MissionThe mission of the EV Ministry is to spread the good news of Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 福传委员会的使命是要传扬主耶稣基督救恩的好讯息。

sentences.english: This spoke of their need of salvation first and then the oil spoke of power.
sentences.chinese: 这预表我们先需要救恩，然后再需要圣灵的能力。

sentences.english: They are to subdue their self-will so that they might be open to God's salvation.
sentences.chinese: 要他们征服自我意志，使他们可以对神的救恩开放。

sentences.english: Sing to the Lord , praise his name; proclaim his salvation day after day.
sentences.chinese: 要向耶和华歌唱，称颂他的名，天天传扬他的救恩。

sentences.english: This benefit of salvation is priceless.
sentences.chinese: 这份救恩的福乐是无价的。

sentences.english: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins
sentences.chinese: 叫他的百姓因罪得赦，就知到救恩。

sentences.english: How shall we escape if we ignore such a great salvation?
sentences.chinese: 我们若忽略这么大的救恩，怎能逃罪呢？

sentences.english: Seeing this salvation is what gives us peace both in living and in dying.
sentences.chinese: 看见神的救恩，令我们无论是生是死都得平安。

sentences.english: With long life will I satisfy him, and shew him my salvation.
sentences.chinese: 我要使他足享长寿，将我的救恩显明给他。

sentences.english: Oh that the salvation of Israel were come out of Zion!
sentences.chinese: 但愿以色列的救恩从锡安而出。

sentences.english: And the word "us" covers the great crowd of men and women who will all meet in heaven some day.
sentences.chinese: 是指历世历代接受救恩，将来会在天家相聚的男女。

sentences.english: Truly my soul waiteth upon God; from Him cometh my salvation.
sentences.chinese: 我的心等候神，我的救恩是从他而来。

sentences.english: III. Salvation-Yasha- is to relieve such constriction.
sentences.chinese: 救恩乃是要把我们从这种束缚中释放。

sentences.english: With salvation's walls surrounded, Thou mayst smile at all thy foes.
sentences.chinese: 救恩墙垣四围环绕，尽可嗤笑众仇敌。

sentences.english: Mine eyes fail for thy salvation, and for the word of thy righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 我因盼望你的救恩，和你公义的话，眼睛失明。

sentences.english: My eyes fail from seeking Your salvation And Your righteous word.
sentences.chinese: 我因盼望你的救恩和你公义的话眼睛失明。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
